alert.note: Alert for Luzerne; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 5:00PM EDT until September 09 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Luzerne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Southwestern Wyoming County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 500 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fairmount Spgs, or 16 miles north of Berwick, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Muhlenberg, Harveys Lake, Noxen, Shickshinny, Forkston, New Columbus, Kasson Brook, Evans Falls, Lovelton, and Sweet Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
